skills.title: Full-Stack Development
skills.description: Proficient in both Front-End and Back-End technologies. Experienced in creating seamless user interfaces and  server-side logic for web applications.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Skilled in designing and managing databases, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval. Experienced in optimizing database performance and implementing data security measures.

skills.title: Graphic Design
skills.description: Creative and detail-oriented UI & UX designer with a focus on delivering visually appealing and user-friendly designs. Proficient in using design tools for wireframing and prototyping.

skills.title: Mobile App Development
skills.description: Specialized in developing mobile applications for Android platforms. Proficient in  cross-platform frameworks, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.

portfolio.title: Humble-Uni Driving Academy
portfolio.description: Comprehensive web application designed to streamline the processes of a driving school.

portfolio.title: Este-Bakno music website
portfolio.description: The website showcases a diverse collection of artists, albums, and genres.

portfolio.title: Wits-Overflow
portfolio.description: This is an app, intended for finding quick help with programming errors around the Wits community.
